title: Healthnotes Joins Forceswith WellMed
description: Healthnotes Joins Forceswith WellMedPORTLAND, Ore.--Healthnotes Inc. announced a partnership with WellMed Inc., which will allow Healthnotes Online to be an option in WellMed's produ
cleaned_text: Joins WellMed PORTLAND, Ore.--Healthnotes Inc. announced a partnership with WellMed Inc., which will allow Healthnotes Online to be an option in WellMed's product offerings. Healthnotes is an online source of information on complementary and alternative medicine, and WellMed is a provider of online consumer health management tools. Under the partnership, sponsoring organizations will be able to utilize Healthnotes Online from WellMed ( [www.wellmed.com](http://www.wellmed.com)). The purpose of the partnership, according toWellMed, was to provide its sponsors with resources on the topic of alternative medicine. The WellMed Personal Health ManagerT is comprised of more than 60 products and services that are licensed to companies seeking online health resources for their members and employees. Healthnotes Online ( [www.healthnotes.com](http://www.healthnotes.com)) provides users with clinically proven information on herbal remedies, dietary supplements, drug-nutrient interactions, depletions and special diets.
